channel.title: How to make Owners not get banned
channel.description:
Hello, i was wondering, is there any command so that owners cant get banned and if somone attempts it then it sends message this player cant get banned,
I have tried to code it but it didn't work
Please help me thanks

item.title: How to make Owners not get banned
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“pure ess ftw, post:7, topic:272855”][quote author=Rickpwns link=topic=360159.msg2744719#msg2744719 date=1239559769]

dude… you just go to ipban or bans etc… and take your IP/name off…

That’s what I was saying.
[/quote]
OK,here is something for you, people have access to “cheat” clients, some of these makes you owner, admin ect! which then they could ban. he wants to make it so HE can’t get banned incase of one of these or a freak incident.
@topic-
you will need to do something like this…(in your ban code)

[code]
make statment that has “if ^playername^”
rest of code ladadada
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "bans"); //delete this probably o.o
		p.disconnected = false;

[/code][/quote]

Wrong. Cheat clients only make u display as staff on your screen they dont give you any powers.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Owners not get banned

item.title: How to make Owners not get banned
item.dc:creator: @Choosen_1 Choosen 1
item.description:
@Choosen_1 wrote:

[quote=“Rickpwns, post:2, topic:272855”]Why would you even want that. If you can’t trust another owner, and you’re scared that he’s going to ban you, why make him an owner? You can always unban yourself, if you have the files. -.-

+Rep? :D[/quote]dude if your going to be a jerk about it dont post and then especially dont ask for rep+ if you didnt help at all

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Owners not get banned

item.title: How to make Owners not get banned
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Rickpwns, post:6, topic:272855”][quote author=twins link=topic=360159.msg2744717#msg2744717 date=1239559729]
dude… you just go to ipban or bans etc… and take your IP/name off…
[/quote]
That’s what I was saying.[/quote]
OK,here is something for you, people have access to “cheat” clients, some of these makes you owner, admin ect! which then they could ban. he wants to make it so HE can’t get banned incase of one of these or a freak incident.
@topic-
you will need to do something like this…(in your ban code)

*make statment that has "if ^playername^"*
*rest of code ladadada*
 if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                        client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

			writeLog(p.playerName, "bans"); //delete this probably o.o
			p.disconnected = false;

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Owners not get banned

@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Just in the ban command, put a statement that if its your name, it bans the player instead. Not you.
